item.title: Problem set 3
item.description: Task 0: Getting started Create a new RStudio project somewhere on your computer. Open that new folder in Windows File Explorer or macOS Finder (however you navigate around the files on your computer), and create a subfolder there named output. Download this R Markdown file and place it in your newly-created projectYou’ll probably have to right click on the link and choose “Save link as…”. It contains an outline/skeleton of the one task you’ll need to do in this problem set.
